meanings.definition: A game similar to bocce, played by individuals with physical disabilities.
meanings.sent1: In boccia, players aim to throw their balls closest to the target.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys playing boccia with her friends at the community center.
meanings.sent3: During the boccia game, the ball accidentally bounced into the audience, causing laughter.
meanings.sent4: The intensity of the boccia match was like a battle of precision and strategy.
meanings.sent5: The colorful boccia balls rolling on the court created a vibrant scene.

meanings.definition: The ball used in the game of boccia.
meanings.sent1: The boccia rolled smoothly across the court towards the target.
meanings.sent2: He picked up the boccia and examined its weight before his turn.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog ran off with the boccia, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her hopes rested on the boccia, the key to winning the game.
meanings.sent5: The shiny boccia gleamed under the bright lights of the arena.
